duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform diagnostic radiographic procedures to produce images for medical disorder diagnosis and treatment.
Obtain and document patient information for appropriate exams.
Ensure accuracy and quality control of radiographic exams.
Apply ALARA principle to minimize ionizing radiation exposure.
Contribute to a team approach to provide optimal quality patient care.
Maintain annual licensure and comply with clinic policies.
Participate in quality improvement activities and mandatory education.
Assist in orienting new staff and training students.

education_certification.credential: Two year AMA accredited School of Radiologic Technology
